A larger version of the Singularity Tank, Holds 1024 buckets worth of any liquid.
block.mob_grinding_utils.xpsolidifier.je: Solidifies Fluid XP using moulds to create edible xp jellies.
block.mob_grinding_utils.tinted_glass.je: Allows you to see the inside of the mob farm without letting light inside.
block.mob_grinding_utils.dreadful_dirt.j: Rapidly spawns monsters in the dark, will burn if exposed to the sky during the day.
A block of solidified experience, very bouncy, much fun.
_comment: Mob Masher Fake Player (Shows in Death Message)
tooltip.fan_1: Pushes Mobs in the facing direction.
tooltip.fan_2: Can be modified with Mob Fan Upgrades.
tooltip.fan_3: Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
tooltip.saw_2: Can be enhanced with Mob Masher Upgrades.
tooltip.saw_3: Mobs Mashed DO count as Player Kills.
tooltip.hopper_1: Vacuums up Items and XP Orbs in a 7x7x7 area.
tooltip.hopper_2: Can be configured to push out on any side.
tooltip.hopper_3: Fluids will insert to Tanks and Items to Inventories.
tooltip.hopper_4: Range is increased by Absorption Radius Upgrades.
tooltip.hopper_5: Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
tooltip.hopper_6: Position can be offset in it's gui.
tooltip.spikes_1: Basic spikes - will also drop Mob's XP.
tooltip.spikes_2: Mobs killed by spikes DO NOT count as Player Kills.
tooltip.xptap_1: Attach to the side of a Tank.
tooltip.xptap_2: Will turn Fluid XP back to Orbs.
tooltip.withermuffler_3: Right Click to hide Boss Bar.
tooltip.dragonmuffler_3: Right Click to hide Boss Bar.
tooltip.darkoakstone: And they said it couldn't be done...
tooltip.entityconveyor_1: Conveyor to move Mobs and Items along a Horizontal Vector.
tooltip.entityconveyor_2: Mobs Can Spawn on this Block.
tooltip.enderinhibitor_1: Inhibits Teleportation for Entities up to 8 Blocks away.
tooltip.enderinhibitor_2: Can be attached on ANY side of Solid Blocks.
tooltip.tinted_glass_1: Glass blocks designed to prevent light.
tooltip.dreadful_dirt_2: Will Ignite in Daylight if Exposed to the Sky.
tooltip.dreadful_dirt_3: Light level of 10 and above Stops Hostile Mob Spawns.
tooltip.xp_solidifier_2: Requires an XP Mould and Fluid XP in its Tank.
tooltip.xp_solidifier_3: Can be configured to export Horizontally.
tooltip.xp_solidifier_4: Speed is increased with XP Solidifier Speed Upgrades.
tooltip.mobswab_2: Craft with a Bucket of XP and Seeds.
tooltip.rotten_egg_1: Creates a 5x5 area of Dreadful Dirt.
tooltip.rotten_egg_2: Used on Grass, Dirt, Mycelum, or Farmland.
